// no Output
cs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[177], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[5], immediateIndexed
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t0
dcl_uav_typed_texture2d (float,float,float,float) u0
dcl_input vThreadIDInGroupFlattened
dcl_input vThreadGroupID.xy
dcl_input vThreadIDInGroup.xy
dcl_temps 9
dcl_tgsm_structured g0, 8, 64
dcl_thread_group 8, 8, 1

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r5.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw


// WATCH_DOGS2 Camera Position adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-screen-space-reflections-cs --fix-wd2-unproject --fix-wd2-camera-pos -i --only-autofixed ff94cc367ef446ba-cs.txt

mul r5.w, r5.x, r5.y
mul r7.x, r5.w, cb0[9].x
mul r7.y, r5.w, cb0[10].x
mul r7.z, r5.w, cb0[11].x
mul r7.w, r5.w, cb0[12].x
dp4 r8.x, r7.xyzw, cb0[17].xyzw
dp4 r8.y, r7.xyzw, cb0[18].xyzw
dp4 r8.z, r7.xyzw, cb0[19].xyzw
add r6.xyz, cb0[174].xyz, r8.xyz

imad r0.xy, vThreadGroupID.xyxx, l(32, 32, 0, 0), vThreadIDInGroup.xyxx
mov r1.zw, l(0,0,0,0)
mov r0.zw, l(0,0,0,0)
mov r2.y, l(0)
loop 
  uge r2.z, r2.y, l(32)
  breakc_nz r2.z
  mov r3.xy, r0.zwzz
  mov r3.z, l(0)
  loop 
    uge r2.z, r3.z, l(32)
    breakc_nz r2.z
    mov r2.x, r3.z
    iadd r1.xy, r0.xyxx, r2.xyxx
    itof r2.xz, r1.xxyx
    lt r4.xy, r2.xzxx, cb0[66].xyxx
    and r2.w, r4.y, r4.x
    if_nz r2.w
      ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.x, r1.xyzw, t0.wxyz
      div r1.x, r1.x, cb0[176].w
      div r2.xz, r2.xxzx, cb0[66].zzwz
      add r1.y, r1.x, l(9.999999939E-009)
      log r1.y, r1.y
      max r1.y, r1.y, l(-20.000000)
      mad r2.xz, r2.xxzx, l(2.000000, 0.000000, 2.000000, 0.000000), l(-1.000000, 0.000000, -1.000000, 0.000000)
      mul r2.xz, r2.xxzx, l(1.000000, 0.000000, 0.550000, 0.000000)
      dp2 r2.x, r2.xzxx, r2.xzxx
      mul r2.x, r2.x, l(-11.541560)
      exp r2.x, r2.x
      mad r2.x, r2.x, l(0.763943732), l(-1.000000)
      mad r2.x, cb1[4].w, r2.x, l(1.000000)
      and r2.z, r1.x, l(0x7f800000)
      ieq r2.z, r2.z, l(0x7f800000)
      lt r1.x, r1.x, l(9.999999939E-009)
      or r1.x, r1.x, r2.z
      movc r4.y, r1.x, l(0), r2.x
      mul r4.x, r1.y, r4.y
      add r3.xy, r3.xyxx, r4.xyxx
    endif 
    iadd r3.z, r3.z, l(8)
  endloop 
  mov r0.zw, r3.xxxy
  iadd r2.y, r2.y, l(8)
endloop 
store_structured g0.xy, vThreadIDInGroupFlattened.x, l(0), r0.zwzz
sync_g_t
if_z vThreadIDInGroupFlattened.x
  ld_structured r0.xy, l(0), l(0), g0.xyxx
  mov r0.zw, r0.xxxy
  mov r1.x, l(1)
  loop 
    ige r1.y, r1.x, l(64)
    breakc_nz r1.y
    ld_structured r1.yz, r1.x, l(0), g0.xxyx
    add r0.zw, r0.zzzw, r1.yyyz
    iadd r1.x, r1.x, l(1)
  endloop 
  mov r0.xyzw, r0.zwzz
  store_uav_typed u0.xyzw, vThreadGroupID.xyyy, r0.xyzw
endif 
ret 
// Approximately 61 instruction slots used
